imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas.Vector2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Point

    public class Vector2D
extends Object
implements Point
    Implements a 2D point or vector with double coordinates. Instances of this class are immutable.

    • Nested Class Summary
